document.full_text: some analysts and investors say the biggest damage from the sokol affair may be to warren buffett's reputation, but it is unlikely to deter deal-making at berkshire hathaway.
document.title: guessing game builds over buffett's next deal
lines_and_colors: some analysts and investors say the biggest damage from the sokol affair may be to warren buffett's reputation, but it is unlikely to deter deal-making at berkshire hathaway.
